entry.title: Dakhal.in, India’s First Social Network by Pair of Son-Dad
entry.content:
This is quite interesting news for all especially for Indians. A team of a son-father developed India’s first social networking website with name Dakhal.in, The website is not even one month old but it’s catching a fire like Facebook.

Dakhal.in  is developed by a student of 8thStandard Shubam Wagh and His father Dilip Wagh who belongs from Nasik. with the collaboration of father Shubham created this website which could be a great competitor to other social networking sites especially in India.

This pair proved again, age doesn’t matter if you have talent, you can do anything and achieve anything. In present era many website are joining Internet world every second, but the idea of making a website as competetor of Facebook is not everyone’s cup of tea.

Dakhal Looks similar to Facebook

Everybody knows that Facebook is most popular social networking site and people love to use it all the time, so dad-son pair decided to establish a website that give feeling of using Facebook with some more advanced and useful features.

Owner of Dakhal Shubam is a 13 years old kid, studying in 8th class at Saint Francis School in Nasik learned these all stuff from his father. They claim that Dakhal is the first social networking website of India offering Entertainment, Chatting, Jobs & much more facilities.

Contents in Dakhal.in

Chatting is the soul of any social networking website and so it is must, They knew it very well so they provided easy chatting controls they also decided to add more information and features which are necessary for Indian citizens. Dakhal is launched about 1 month ago and started gaining popularity with remarkable speed.

Dakhal mainly having these  features and contents

 Chatting like Facebook  Entertainment  Ancestry (option to create Family Tree)  Jobs Procedure  My Village  Preparation School Examinations

 

How Developer Find contents

The idea of making a unique website is although very good but firstly they had to collect data, more and more ideas. Dilig Wagh (co-desgner of Dakhal) said his son Shubam has so much interest in Ancestry and his village. When he went to his village, he took some pictures of village  & there after he uploaded them on the website.

Not only this for making it more good and uploading more material related to the ancestry, he went to cities of Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, Gujrat for collecting the information about Ancestry. They met lots of people in these cities and find their way of living and their Ancestors.

 

Academic & Job Help from Dakhal

On first first official social Network of India, detailed information regarding examination of Lok Seva with preparation of different examination along with Question papers for entrance examination are available. This will assists and play very important role for those who are looking to crack competition exams.

Similarly in the field of Jobs like Banking, Defence, Engineering, the whole course & Selection procedure is also available in this website. There is a question paper in Dakhal.in which contains maximum of 50Marks. The candidate who secure maximum marks will be awarded with a sum of 2000 INR.

Academic help for the students of class first to 10+2 with Engineering, management, Computer science, Aeronautics are also available with large number of additional courses . For making study more easy, the courses from Indira Gandhi National Open University (IGNOU) with a total of 20,000 courses are available in Video & Audio Formats.

As Dakhal is so similar to Facebook in look andprovide really important and very useful features and content, it can be expected it will attain popularity like leading social networks soon.

Here is snapshot of my newly created profile on Dakhal.in

Developers describe Dakhal.in with these words

Dakhal social networking limited service is an online service, platform, that focuses on facilitating the building of social networks or social relations among people in India and international also. on Dakhal you can share interests, activities, Videos/Images, or real-life connections, you can play online games learn using online education facility for all.Dakhal also allows its members to create their own family tree, share pictures and videos, organize family events, and search for ancestors.

entry.title: Largest Memory Unit, Detailed List : Smallest to Biggest
entry.content:
In today’s world of technology we use memory and it’s terms everywhere, we know memory is the physical devices used to store all kind of digital programs, and data for temporary or permanent basis for access those data in computer or other digital electronic devices.

KB, MB, GB are terms which are used everywhere to distinguish data size, some of us know that data unit starts from a bit which is equal to a binary character but have you ever wondered what is the maximum memory unit, I know you don’t ! and even if you have wondered of it, then let me tell you, whatever you have wondered is too less.

Here is the detailed list of digital memory units smallest to biggest See this and think How far do u know.

1 Bit : 1 Binary Digit
4 bit : 1 Nibble
8 Bit : 1 Byte
1024 Byte : 1 Kilobyte (KB)
1024 Kilobyte : 1 Megabyte (MB)
1024 Megabyte : 1 Gigabyte (GB)
1024 Gigabyte : 1 Terabyte (TB)
1024 Terabyte : 1 Petabyte (PB)
1024 Petabyte : 1 Exabyte (EB)
1024 Exabyte : 1 Zettabyte (ZB)
1024 Zettabyte : 1 Yottabyte (YB)
--------------------------------------------- 10
1024 Yottabyte : 1 Brontobyte
1024 Brontobyte : 1 Geopbyte
1024 Geopbyte : 1 Saganbyte
1024 Saganbyte : 1 Pijabyte
1024 Pijabyte : 1 Alphabyte
1024 Alphabyte : 1 Kryatbyte
1024 Kryatbyte : 1 Amosbyte
1024 Amosbyte : 1 Pectrolbyte
1024 Pectrolbyte : 1 Bolgerbyte
1024 Bolgerbyte : 1 Sambobyte
--------------------------------------------- 20
1024 Sambobyte : 1 Quesabyte
1024 Quesabyte : 1 Kinsabyte
1024 Kinsabyte : 1 Rutherbyte
1024 Rutherbyte : 1 Dubnibyte
1024 Dubnibyte : 1 Seaborgbyte
1024 Seaborgbyte : 1 Bohrbyte
1024 Bohrbyte : 1 Hassiubyte
1024 Hassiubyte : 1 Meitnerbyte
1024 Meitnerbyte : 1 Darmstadbyte
1024 Darmstadbyte : 1 Roentbyte
---------------------------------------------- 30
1024 Roentbyte : 1 Coperbyte
1024 Coperbyte : 1 Koentekbyte
1024 Koentekbyte : 1 Silvanikbyte
1024 Silvanikbyte : 1 Golvanikbyte
1024 Golvanikbyte : 1 Platvanikbyte
1024 Platvanikbyte : 1 Einstanikbyte
1024 Einstanikbyte : 1 Emeranikbyte
1024 Emeranikbyte : 1 Rubanikbyte
1024 Rubanikbyte : 1 Diamonikbyte
1024 Diamonikbyte : 1 Amazonikbyte
----------------------------------------------- 40
1024 Amazonikbyte : 1 Nilevanikbyte
1024 Nilevanikbyte : 1 Infinitybyte
1024 Infinitybyte : 1 Websitebyte

Note : There is no official measurement for memory unit size after Yottabyte yet, but these are suggestions with strong potential, so from now we can say websitebyte is the largest memory unit for digital devices.

entry.title: Do Not Believe on Websites Like GetwebsiteWorth.com
entry.content:
There are more than enough websites over internet who tells the a website’s worth, their income, page views, daily traffic, Ads revenues etc and well known example of this type of websites is Getwebsiteworth.com, This is a site who tells worth of websites, by tracing some stats of a website.

I’m very sure that, You Guys have also checked your website worth on some websites like this many time and became happy after knowing the worth of your website, but the thing I’m going to tell you through this post will make your a lil bit sad for sure.

All these kind of websites who shows estimated cost of a website are non-Trustable, I mean don’t trust on any of them, now you may surely wanted to ask but why I don’t believe on Getwebsiteworth ? right ! oh yeah I’m sure you wanted to ask this, so here are the points..

  • All these websites who tell value of a website are also a particular website and they want traffic on their site same like we want on our website, and for this they make people fool.
  • These websites trace some data of our website from internet which are easily available for anyone like Alexa ranking and search engine health of our website.
  • After fetching these data from internet they estimate worth of our website by following some Algorithms.
  • The worth is calculated by taking the average of ranking, SEO properties, search engine visibility etc.
  • On the basis of those records, they produce fake calculated worth and other result like Pageviews and ads revenues.
  • Even after they show clearly fake information & result on their sites, people go heavily crowded to these sites on regular interval for checking whether worth of their site increased or not, they feel happy to see their website’s worth but they are unaware of the fact that, they have been tricked and these website making people nothing more than fool and they don’t want any occasion like April fool for this.

 

Note : I’m not talking about Getwebsiteworth.com only instead I’m talking about all those websites who shows worth of a website.

I know still many people not ready to believe on me and  my words, no problem it’s human tendency to not believe on true things they love to be sticked with those things which make them smile no matter those things are genuine or not, but no worries I have a proof.

If you are also one of those category people then in next few lines you will start believing on me, here is the proof why I’m telling you to not believe on Getwebsiteworth.com or any of this type of website.

First of all see this picture..

[caption id=“attachment_6011” align=“aligncenter” width=“479”] snapshot taken last week from Getwebsiteworth[/caption]

 

This is great, isn’t it. According to this record my website Harkuchh.Com having 46,608 daily pageviews this is kind of joke for me you know why, because actual daily pageviews of my website is average 6-8K… Wait wait don’t laugh yet I’ve one joke to crack here which make you laugh harder, according to Getwebsteworth my Daily Ads Revenue is $196 :D and you know what, Harkuchh.Com’s actual daily ads revenues is less than $10 till today. Hehehehe….. 

Now see the difference where is $196 and where it stands on $10, now I think I don’t need to explain it anymore, you guys are smart and most probably having your own brain inside your skull (tell me if you don’t :P ) so now you are going to believe on these kind of stuff  in future ! comment if you liked it.

entry.title: Google Is a Girl, I Can Prove It
entry.content:
Is Google male or Female ? Funny question, right ! oh yeah it’s funny, but you will be amazed if I tell you that many people over Internet consistently searching for answer of this question, when I saw it first I was also amazed but my brain took no time for remembering me a line which I read once on facebook that On the Internet you can be anything you want, it’s strange that so many people choose to be stupid.

Now if many people searching for Google is a girl or boy, then it’s our duty to provide reliable and best results to them, after all we are bloggers :) so here I’m with the results and I’m damn sure that after reading this post you will salute me, so without wasting time let’s start now..

 

1.  Google is a Girl because it won’t let you complete the whole sentence, and without knowing what you exactly want it start guessing & suggesting not even only this it also happens that you ask only one question but get hundreds of irrelevant answers in seconds it often gives good but sometimes humorous suggestions and the world knows ladies can’t survive without these thing.

 

2. All bloggers will be fully agree with this point, Google is a girl because generally it happen that a girl refuse again and again to a boy for friendship by giving different reasons but if the guy keep on trying then girl start thinking and if she realise that the boy is not bad then most probably she accept the proposal, same thing do google in case of Adsense, it’s true think of it.

 

3. I call Google a girl because it Advertising too much for itself and also advertises others matters and certainly it’s one of the most special trait of women caste.

 

4. You will find people rarely who don’t like girls and same like that it’s not easy to find people who don’t like using Google for search operation, now if you’re going to tell me Dude people also use Yahoo, Bing, Msn etc instead of google then don’t forget there are also some people exist who strictly avoid girls, don’t believe me ! just come to my college and meet Narhar  afterall exception is everywhere.

 

5. Google is a girl because it’s good and holy place for those who use Internet for just  educational stuff, research material, various info etc but there is also another aspect that google provides material which satisfy a horny man :-P  same like that a girl is very good for all but she do all those naughty things for her man.

 

6. Only a girl is capable of giving real pleasure to a man which other options can never give, those things can give partial satisfaction not pleasure same like that Google gives the best results which make seeker fully satisfied.

 

7. This is funny but true Google can be called a girl because once we start relationship with google (analytics) it keeps all records about our product whether it’s a website or blog it keep tracking who visited our blog, how many pages a visitor saw, how much time they spend there etc and a girl always aware of what her man is doing.

 

8. It is rarely seen when a girl actually sits quite, I was very amazed when once I read somewhere that `The Japanese have developed a camera with a shutter so fast, it can actually capture a photo of female with her mouth closed :P and it also happens less than once in years when Google become quite and stop giving results.

 

9. Google is a perfect female because the home page looks greatly simple but its reach on the web is so deep same like a Woman might look shallow but the heart of a woman is as deep as the ocean as said in blockbuster Titanic movie.

 

10. Best reason for topic Google is a girl, and here it is, On special occasions a girl decorates herself very elegantly and looks very pretty and different than normal days, and you must have seen the various ways google write it’s name on the site on Christmas, New year, Valentines etc and it also looks very nice and different.

 

I have some more points like, google is female because it aims at organizing the worlds data and we know it’s traditionally womans work organize, arrange, keep home do whatever you want certainly it’s not man’s work, another point Google is a girl because it has OO 

Hahahaha…. so you going to salute me or not, Ok don’t salute me, I know your ego will not allow you to do that :P but please comment and tell me you like it or not, How'z it. You can say whatever is in your mind, don’t forget to share Thank you..

entry.title: Secure Your Gmail Account With 2-Step Verification
entry.content:
This is something very important for everyone I think. Securing your gmail (e-mail) accounts is one of the most important task while using internet. Now you can secure your Gmail account by using 2-step verification it is preety simple and really very effective tool to keep your emails secure from anybody other than you.

In this login procedure would need more than just your password to open your account and access any mail from there it’s like a strong protective layer to gmail account.

 

 The 2-Step verification procedure for Gmail account is very easy, you just need to follow some steps to enable that strong security feature to your email account. You can either choose to receive the 6-digit security codes on your mobile phone via text messages or a Voice call from Google.

 

To get started you just go to your Gmail account’s security page and Enable 2-step verification. Here is the complete procedure, follow this :

 

    1. Sign in to your Gmail account. 
    2. Click on Account and then Security.
    3. There you will see 2-step verification, Click on Edit.
    4. Now Click on See how it works then Start Setup.
    5. Enter your Phone number and the mode in which you want to recieve code (Text or Call).
    6. Click on Send Code, (you will receive a Code on your mobile in mode you selected)
    7. Enter the Code and click on Varify.
    8. Click  on Confirm on the next page you will see (confirmation page).

 

You will also love to read : Which is The most secure operating system of the world.

 

Congrats you Done :) now in future whenever your fill your Username and Password to sign in your email account you will get a Code through  message, call (depends on mode you selected).

Click on Trust this Computer if you don't want to fill security code again and again at same pc like at home on your personal computer.

Now your secret place to store your favourite pics and videos and also your important emails are completely safe, even if someone get your password he can’t open your account which is really great and it will be much harder to hack or access your email account for anybody.

 

I’m sure you have liked this information and recommend you to Share this Post among your friends and family to give them an unbeatable Cyber protection. Trust me they will surely say a heartiest thanks to you even if you ignore to say it here :)
